sources.full: The Eighteen Sons of The Lightning Lord

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the the Lion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Adamantine Will
entries: The Lion has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws and against any effect that would lower his ability scores.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Lion regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Stubborn
entries: All allied creatures within 30 ft. of the Lion that can see the Lion have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: An Absolute Focus
entries: The Lion never has disadvantage on his attack rolls.

trait.name: Fearsome Ruin
entries: If the Lion reduces a creature to 0 hit points with an attack using the Wolf Blade, other hostile creatures within 15 feet of the slain creature must succeed a {@dc 21} Wisdom save or become {@condition frightened} of the Lion until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Multiattack Defence
entries: When a creature hits the Lion with an attack, the Lion gains a +4 bonus to their AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: The Leonine Panoply
entries: Once per turn, whilst wearing this armour, the Lion may re-roll a failed saving throw.

trait.name: The Lion's Choler
entries: When the Lion has equal to or less than half his maximum hit points he makes an additional melee or ranged attack upon using his multiattack. When the Lion has equal to or less than a quarter his maximum hit points he makes two additional melee or one additional ranged attack upon using his multiattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Lion makes five melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lion Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) slashing damage. The Lion may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result and may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. If the weapon scores a critical hit the critical damage is 13 ({@damage 3d8}) instead of 9 ({@damage 2d8}).

action.name: Wolf Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d4 + 9}) slashing damage. The Lion may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result. Attacks made with this weapon count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

action.name: Fusil Actinaeus
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d4 + 6}) fire damage. The Lion may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. On a hit the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition Blinded} until the end of their next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Lion adds 8 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them. To do so, the Lion must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The Lion targets up to two allies it can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see and hear the Lion, the target can make one attack as a reaction.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Phoenician fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Multiattack Defence
entries: When a creature hits the Phoenician with an attack, the Phoenician gains a +4 bonus to their AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: The Gilded Panoply
entries: Whilst within 5ft. of an enemy creature the Phoenician's AC is increased by +2; additionally any creature that rolls a natural 1 when attacking the Phoenician with a melee attack must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition blinded}} until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Phoenician regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Sublime Swordsman
entries: The Phoenician has a +5 bonus to his initiative rolls; additionally the Phoenician gains an extra attack against a creature for every 5 points higher on the initiative order he is compared to his target.

trait.name: The Maru Skara
entries: The Phoenician's melee weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18, 19 or 20.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: One of the older weapons the Phoenician carried into battle was a sword called Fireblade, he may be armed with this weapon instead of The Blade of the Laer. Additionally the Phoenician may re-roll any damage die of a 1 or 2 with these weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Phoenician makes five melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: The Blade of the Laer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. If any of the damage dice roll maximum damage the Phoenician may roll one additional damage die. Attacks made with this weapon count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

action.name: Fireblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. The Phoenician may roll the damage dice for this weapon twice, choosing the higher result of the two. Additionally if the weapon scores a critical hit the critical damage is 10 ({@damage 4d4}) instead of 7 ({@damage 2d6}).

action.name: Firebrand
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 15} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d4 + 7}) fire damage. If hit, any creature within 5ft. of the target must succeed a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 3d4}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Phoenician adds 8 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them. To do so, the Phoenician must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature misses the Phoenician with a melee attack, he can make a melee weapon attack against the creature.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The Phoenician targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the Phoenician, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The Phoenician makes a melee weapon attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Iron fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Logos
entries: A unique and finely crafted suit of armour, the logos grants the Iron immunity to being {@condition {@condition blinded}} or {@condition {@condition stunned}} and has a pair of wrist cannons integrated into it. Additionally the logos may let the Iron make his voice boom up to three times as loud and he may communicate with another creature within 30 feet of him as if the Iron was stood next to that creature.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Iron regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Siege Master
entries: The Iron deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Spoils of Treachery
entries: If The Gorgon is no longer in possession of Forgebreaker then The Iron may wield it in battle.

trait.name: Stubborn
entries: All allied creatures within 30 ft. of the Iron that can see the Iron have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition {@condition frightened}}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Iron makes four melee attacks or he may make three ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Logos Gauntlets
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. The Iron may re-roll damage die of a 1 or a 2 with this weapon and attacks with this weapon treat immunity as resistance.

action.name: Forgebreaker
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If hit and affected by the damage, the target's movement speed is reduced by 5 ft. until the end of their next turn and they must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition stunned}} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Forgebreaker (Smash)
entries: he Iron smashes his hammer into the ground causing a tremor. Each creature within 5 ft. of the Iron must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Wrist Cannon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) force damage. On a critical hit the target takes an additional 6 ({@damage 1d12}) force damage.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The Iron targets two allied creatures he can see within 60 feet of him. If the target can see and hear the Iron, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll or the target may move up to their movement speed without provoking attacks of opportunity.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The Iron makes a wrist cannon attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the the Khan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Bleak Wind
entries: All allied creatures within 15 feet of the Khan and the Khan himself can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on their turn. Additionally the Khan may take the Dash action as a bonus action and whenever the Khan makes an initiative roll he can treat a {@dice d20} roll of 12 or lower as a 13.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Khan regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Multiattack Defence
entries: When a creature hits the Khan with an attack, the Khan gains a +4 bonus to their AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Ferocious Charger
entries: If the Khan moves at least 10 feet in a straight line towards a creature than hits it with an attack it must succeed a {@dc 24} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Unmatched Rider
entries: Whilst mounted the Khan's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, he has advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling off his mount and can ride mounts as if he was a medium-sized creature. Additionally the Khan has advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures who are a smaller size than his mount and if the Khan falls off his mount and descends no more than 10 feet, he can land on his feet if he's not {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: The Wildfire Panoply
entries: Whilst within 5ft. of an enemy creature the Khan's AC is increased by +2; additionally the Khan's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can't reduce his speed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Khan makes six melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: White Tiger Dao
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) slashing damage, or 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage if used with both hands. The Khan may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. Additionally the first attack made on a turn adds +2 to its damage.

action.name: Arcane Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 15} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) radiant damage. If hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 7 ({@damage 3d4}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Khan adds 8 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them. To do so, the Khan must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Lightning from Blue Skies
entries: The Khan calls for a fast strike at the enemy, leading his men to action. The Khan may choose up to 5 creatures (including himself) within 30 feet of him to immediately move up to their movement speed and make a single attack against a hostile creature they can see.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Wolf King fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Armed to the Teeth
entries: Should he either choose to change weapons or be disarmed of Mjalnar and Helwinter the Wolf King may use his shortsword and shield in tandem; his AC increases to 26 and he makes his six melee attacks with his shortsword. Additionally if the Wolf King has a free hand he may opt to swing or throw his handaxe or make an unarmed strike. However the Wolf King may opt to wield the two-handed Spear of The Wolf King instead of Mjalnar and Helwinter.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Wolf King regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: The Armour Elavagar
entries: Enemies whom attempt to attack the Wolf King up close suffer a -2 penalty to their melee attack rolls and the Wolf King's AC increases by +1 when he's targeted by an attack that deals fire damage. Additionally all hostile creatures within 5 feet of the Wolf King at the end of his turn suffer 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

trait.name: Pack Leader
entries: All allied creatures within 5 feet of an enemy hit by a melee attack from the Wolf King gain advantage on their attack rolls against that creature on their next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Wolf King makes six melee attacks split between the weapons he is armed with. Instead he may make three ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning or slashing damage.

action.name: Frostblade Mjalnar - Sword of Balenight
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) cold damage. If hit and affected by the damage, the target must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 10 ({@damage 4d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Frostaxe Helwinter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d12 + 8}) slashing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 4d4}) cold damage.

action.name: Spear of The Wolf King
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage. The Wolf King may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. If the target has 50 hit points or fewer they must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or die instantly. Additionally this weapon is considered adamantine and a creature pierced by this weapon has some aspect of truth revealed to them.

action.name: Scornspitter
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage. If an attack with this weapon is a critical hit it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage in melee, or 11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage at range.

legendary.name: Howl of the Death Wolf
entries: The Wolf King howls loud and long, inspiring nearby allies to action. The Wolf King may choose two allied creatures within 30 feet of him to immediately move up to half their movement speed and take the attack action against a hostile creature they can see.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The Swift has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Swift has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Swift's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: The Hearth Wolves of the King
entries: This stat block represents the one of the two wolf Companions that accompany the Wolf King into battle.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Swift makes three melee attacks, one with their bite and two with their claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Swift exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The arctic-dwelling winter wolf is as large as a dire wolf but has snow-white fur and pale blue eyes. Frost giants use these evil creatures as guards and hunting companions, putting the wolves' deadly breath weapon to use against their foes. Winter wolves communicate with one another using growls and barks, but they speak Common and Giant well enough to follow simple conversations.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The Cunning has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The Cunning has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Cunning's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: The Hearth Wolves of the King
entries: This stat block represents the one of the two wolf Companions that accompany the Wolf King into battle.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Cunning makes three melee attacks, one with their bite and two with their claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The Cunning exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The arctic-dwelling winter wolf is as large as a dire wolf but has snow-white fur and pale blue eyes. Frost giants use these evil creatures as guards and hunting companions, putting the wolves' deadly breath weapon to use against their foes. Winter wolves communicate with one another using growls and barks, but they speak Common and Giant well enough to follow simple conversations.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Praetorian fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Auric Armour
entries: The Praetorian ignores damage from damage dice that rolled a 1 or a 2.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Praetorian regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Stoic Defiance
entries: If the number of non-{@condition incapacitated} enemy creatures within 5 feet of the Praetorian is greater than the number of non-{@condition incapacitated} allied creatures the Praetorian can make 2 more attacks with Storm's Teeth as a bonus action.

trait.name: Unshakeable Defence
entries: All allied creatures within 30 feet of the Praetorian can add his Charisma modifier (+5) to their Wisdom saving throws and their movement speed can't be reduced. Additionally whilst in half (or more) cover if the Praetorian is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he can use his reaction to take no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Praetorian makes four melee attacks or two Sundering Blows. Instead he may make three ranged attacks with The Voice of Terra or five ranged attacks with The Voice of Terra if the Praetorian moves 0ft. on his turn.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Storm's Teeth
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage, or 18 ({@damage 4d4 + 8}) slashing damage if used with both hands. The Praetorian may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result.

action.name: Sundering Blow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d4 + 10}) slashing damage. The Praetorian may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result. If the target has 50 hit points or fewer it must succeed a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or die instantly.

action.name: The Voice of Terra
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage. If the attack is a critical hit it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The Praetorian targets up to three allies it can see within 30 feet of it. If the targets can see and hear the Praetorian, the target can make one weapon attack each as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Night fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The Night has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Night regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: The King of Terrors
entries: The Night has advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) and Dexterity (Stealth) checks and creatures that make saving throws against being {@condition {@condition frightened}} by the Night make them at disadvantage. Additionally the Night may Dash and Disengage as bonus actions and whilst in dim light or darkness, the Night can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: The Nightmare Mantle
entries: Bedecked in grisly trophies of judgement and flayed skins this suit of armour is a horror to behold. Each creature that can see the Night must succeed a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition {@condition frightened}} until the end of it's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to The Nightmare Mantle for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Night Vision
entries: The Night can see in darkness as if it were bright light and has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made with sight whilst in dim light or darkness.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Night makes six melee attacks split between Mercy and Forgiveness or three ranged attacks with his Widowmakers.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mercy
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) slashing damage. The Night may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result. On a critical hit this weapon deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Forgiveness
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) slashing damage. The Night may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result. On a critical hit this weapon deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Widowmakers
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 15} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage. On a critical hit this weapon deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Terrify
entries: Each creature of the Night's choice that is within 60 feet of the Night and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition {@condition frightened}} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Night's Terrify for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The Night makes a melee weapon attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Angel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Angelic Presence
entries: All friendly creatures within 60ft. of the Angel have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition {@condition frightened}}. Additionally they may make an additional attack the first time they take the attack action after rolling initiative.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Angel regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Great Wings
entries: The Angel has advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws whilst using his flying speed. Additionally when the Angel flies at least 15ft. towards a target and hits it with an attack, that attack deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: The Black Rage
entries: If the Angel drops to 0 hit points then all friendly creatures within 120ft. must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom Saving Throw or enter the Black Rage. This effect lasts for 1 minute and whilst under it on the creature's turn it must move as far as it can towards the nearest enemy creature in range, and use its attack action against it.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The Angel may either be equipped with The Blade Encarmine or the Spear of Telesto and Moonsilver Blade. Attacks made with any of the aforementioned weapons count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Angel makes six melee attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: The Blade Encarmine
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) slashing damage, or 18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) slashing damage if used with both hands. The Angel may add an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage on top of the extra damage from a critical hit. Additionally the Angel may make a additional attack with this weapon as a bonus action if the number of hostile creatures within 10 feet outnumbers the number of friendly creatures within 10 feet.

action.name: The Spear of Telesto
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage, or 22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage if used with both hands. The Angel may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. Additionally on a critical hit, instead of rolling extra damage die, the weapon's damage is doubled.

action.name: Moonsilver Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) piercing damage. On a hit the target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition blinded}} until the end of their next turn. The Angel may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. Additionally if a target hit by this weapon is a fiend they take an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Infernus {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) fire damage, plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) radiant damage. The Angel may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon.

action.name: Prescience (1/Day)
entries: The Angel can cast the spell {@spell Divination|PHB} once a day. The spell requires no material components and represent's the Angel's ability to receive glimpses of the future through meditation. The modifier for this spell is Intelligence.

reaction.name: Without Relent, Without Remorse
entries: When an enemy creature leaves the Angel's reach, he may move up to half his movement speed and then make a single attack against that creature.

legendary.name: Rapid Strike
entries: The Angel may make a single melee attack against a creature within range.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: The Angel beats his wings. Each creature within 5 feet of the Angel must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The Angel can then fly up to half its flying speed.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Gorgon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Living Metal Hands
entries: The Gorgon's unarmed strikes are magical. Additionally he is considered to have smith's tools as long as he has both his hands.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Gorgon regains 15 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Master of Mechanisms
entries: The Gorgon is considered proficient in thieves' tools, tinker's tools & smith's tools. He is able to spend 10 minutes and 100gp worth of materials to improve a mundane item (such as a weapon or piece of armour) into a +1 variant of that item. Additionally the Gorgon may repair objects as if casting the mending cantrip using his action.

trait.name: The Medusan Carapace
entries: An ornate and complex suit of armour incorporating various intricate contraptions on mechanical arms, including a flamethrower and a gravity cannon. The Gorgon may reduce the damage taken from ranged attacks by an amount equal to 10 ({@damage 3d6}). Additionally the Gorgon is considered to have thieves' tools and tinker's tools whilst wearing this armour.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When the Gorgon is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he is reduced to 1 hit point instead. The Gorgon can't use this feature again until he finishes a short or long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Gorgon makes four melee attacks (which includes Forgebreaker (Smash) attacks) or he may make two ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Forgebreaker
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If hit and affected by the damage, the target's movement speed is reduced by 5 ft. until the end of their next turn and they must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition stunned}} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Forgebreaker (Smash)
entries: The Gorgon smashes his hammer into the ground causing a tremor. Each creature within 5 ft. of the Gorgon must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sunfire Blaster
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Flamethrower
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

legendary.name: Gravity Cannon
entries: The Gorgon chooses a point within 30 feet. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature made of inorganic material such as stone, crystal, or metal has disadvantage on this saving throw. A nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried also takes the damage if it's in the effect's area.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the the Slaughterer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Bloodlust
entries: The Slaughterer may re-roll damage dice rolls of 1 or 2 for melee weapon attacks.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Slaughterer regains 13 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: The Butcher's Nails
entries: Each time the Slaughterer reduces a creature to 0 hitpoints he gains an additional melee attack he can make as part of the attack action, up to a limit of ten melee attacks in a single turn. The number of attacks resets to the default once the current combat ends.

trait.name: The Red Angel
entries: All allied creatures within 30 feet of the Slaughterer are immune to being {@condition {@condition frightened}}.

trait.name: Red Sands
entries: The Slaughterer can use his bonus action to issue a challenge to a creature within 60 feet of him, the creature must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the next minute, the creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the Slaughterer, and must make a Wisdom saving throw each time it attempts to move to a space that is more than 30 feet away from the Slaughterer; if it succeeds on this saving throw, this ability doesn't restrict the target's movement for that turn. Additionally once the challenge is issued the Slaughterer has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the challenged target but gains resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The Slaughterer has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the Slaughterer reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the The Slaughterer can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make another attack.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When the Slaughterer is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can drop to 1 hit point instead. The Slaughterer can't use this feature again until he finishes a long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Slaughterer makes six melee attacks split between Gorefather and Gorechild. Instead he may make three ranged attacks with the Spite Furnace.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Gorefather
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. If the weapon scores a critical hit the critical damage is 10 ({@damage 4d4}) instead of 7 ({@damage 2d6}).

action.name: Gorechild
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. If the weapon scores a critical hit the critical damage is 10 ({@damage 4d4}) instead of 7 ({@damage 2d6}).

action.name: The Spite Furnace
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) fire damage. The Slaughterer may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon.

legendary.name: Rampage
entries: The Slaughterer moves up to half his movement speed and makes a weapon attack.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Regent fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Armour of Reason
entries: A polished and decorated set of plate armour that grants the Regent advantage on the first saving throw he has to make each round.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Regent regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Preternatural Strategy
entries: The Regent can focus his strategic intellect to unravel the defences of his foe. As a bonus action he may study one creature that has attacked him or that he has attacked. For each turn after the first that the Regent gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls against his studied target up to a total bonus of +3. This bonus is lost if the Regent attacks a different creature, studies a different creature or combat ends.

trait.name: Unyielding Will
entries: The Regent's Wisdom score cannot be reduced and he has advantage on Wisdom saving throws against spells and other magical effects. Additionally all allied creatures within 30 feet of the Regent can add his Charisma modifier (+5) to their Wisdom saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Regent makes five melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Gladius Incandor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. The Regent may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result. If the weapon scores a critical hit the critical damage is 10 ({@damage 3d6}) instead of 7 ({@damage 2d6}).

action.name: Hand of Dominion
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If hit and affected by the damage, they must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition stunned}} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: The Arbitrator
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage. If the attack is a critical hit it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Focus Fire!
entries: The Regent chooses up to 3 friendly creatures to gain a +3 bonus to their attack rolls against a target that's already been hit by an ally this round.

legendary.name: Hold the Line!
entries: The Regent chooses up to 3 friendly creatures which may include himself; if a hostile creature comes within 5 feet of one of these creatures, they may use their reaction to make a single melee attack against the hostile creature.

legendary.name: Rally to me brothers!
entries: The Regent chooses up to 3 friendly creatures, they all gain 12 ({@dice 1d12 + 6}) temporary hit points.

legendary.name: With me, as one!
entries: The Regent chooses up to 3 friendly creatures to gain a +3 bonus to their attack rolls against a target that's already been hit by the Regent's attacks until the start of his next turn.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Reaper fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Preternatural Resilience
entries: The Reaper has advantage on Constitution saving throws and on saving throws made to pass through difficult terrain. Additionally attacks against the Reaper can only score a critical hit on a natural roll of 20.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Reaper regains 15 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Shadow of the Reaper
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition {@condition frightened}} if they can see the Reaper. Additionally if the Reaper can't be seen by a hostile creature he can use his bonus action to move to another spot where he can't be seen within 60 feet.

trait.name: Stubborn
entries: All allied creatures within 30 ft. of the Reaper that can see the Reaper have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition {@condition frightened}}.

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The Reaper deals double damage to objects and structures with Silence & The Lantern.

trait.name: Witch-Spite
entries: The Reaper has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Reaper makes five melee attacks or he may make two ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Silence
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d12 + 8}) slashing damage. If the target has 50 hit points or fewer they must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or die instantly.

action.name: Sweep Attack
entries: The Reaper can make a single attack roll against all creatures within reach with Silence.

action.name: Lantern
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d4 + 6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Phosphex Bomb
entries: The Reaper throws a phosphex bomb at a point within 30 feet creating a burning poisonous aura. All creatures within a 10 foot radius of that point must succeed a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw; they take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and are {@condition {@condition poisoned}} for 1 minute on a failed save, or they take half as much damage and are not {@condition {@condition poisoned}} on a successful one. The aura created by the bomb lasts 1 minute, counts as difficult terrain and moves 5 feet in a random direction each round; any creature entering the aura or starting its turn there must also take the saving throw above.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The Reaper targets up to two allies he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see and hear the Reaper, the target can make one attack as a reaction.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

spellcasting.name: Arch-Sorcerer
headerEntries: The Crimson King is a 28th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save {@dc 23}, +15 to hit with spell attacks). The Crimson King has the following spells prepared:
footerEntries: When casting any spell roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 1 a Wild Magic Surge effect occurs.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Crimson King fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Blade of Ahn-Nunurta
entries: Attacks with this weapon are magical. Additionally the Crimson King can use his bonus action to imbue this weapon with magical power, using a spell slot of 1st level or higher and dealing 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage per spell slot level on the next attack with this weapon that hits. The magical power in the weapon fades after 1 minute if not used.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Crimson King regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: The Eye of the Crimson King
entries: Creatures targeted by spells and ranged attacks by the Crimson King cannot claim a bonus to their AC for being in cover.

trait.name: The Horned Raiment
entries: When the Crimson King is hit by a critical hit, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher the extra damage from the critical hit is negated.

trait.name: Inspiring Presence
entries: All friendly creatures within 30ft. of the Crimson King are immune to being {@condition {@condition frightened}}.

trait.name: Mind Wrath
entries: When casting an evocation spell the Crimson King can channel the power of his arcane might to increase the damage of the spell he casts. The damage and range for the chosen spell is doubled and the spell consumes an additional spell slot equal to half the spell's level (rounding down).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The The Crimson King has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Phantasmal Aura
entries: Attacks against the Crimson King and any allied creature within 15ft. of him are made with a -2 penalty to their attack roll. Additionally they both have advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws against abilities and spells.

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When the Crimson King uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Crimson King makes four melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) bludgeoning or slashing damage.

action.name: The Blade of Ahn-Nunurta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Psyfire Serpenta
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) fire damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the start of their next turn.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The Crimson King may cast a cantrip from the spells he knows.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The Crimson King may make a single melee attack against a creature within range.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Lupercal fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Disabling Strike
entries: If hit and affected by the damage from a melee attack with the Lupercal's Talon, the target must succeed a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or have it's Strength and Dexterity scores reduced by 1. The target dies if this reduces its Strength or Dexterity to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Multiattack Defence
entries: When a creature hits the Lupercal with an attack, the Lupercal gains a +4 bonus to their AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Lupercal regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: God of Battle
entries: If the Lupercal takes the attack action against a creature who's challenge rating or level is equal to half the Lupercal's challenge rating or less, the Lupercal gains an additional 2 ({@dice 1d4}) attacks.

trait.name: Inspiring Leader
entries: All allied creatures within 30ft. of the Lupercal can add his Charisma modifier (+6) to their Wisdom saving throws and have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition {@condition frightened}}.

trait.name: The Serpent's Scales
entries: When the Lupercal is targeted by a magical attack, spell or effect roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 11 or higher this armour negates the damage and effects of the triggering magical attack, spell or effect. Additionally the Lupercal has advantage on saving throws against any effect that would lower his ability scores.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Lupercal makes five melee attacks. Instead he may make three ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) bludgeoning or slashing damage.

action.name: Worldbreaker
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If hit and affected by the damage, the target must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 10 ({@damage 4d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Lupercal's Talon (Melee)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d4 + 9}) slashing damage. The Lupercal may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result.

action.name: Lupercal's Talon (Ranged)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/80 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) piercing damage. When making an attack with this weapon roll 2 {@dice d20}s and choose the higher result. If the attack is a critical hit it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Lupercal adds 8 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them. To do so, the Lupercal must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: The Point of the Spear
entries: The Lupercal may choose up to four allied creatures within 60 feet of him. They may immediately move up to half their movement speed and may take the attack action against a hostile creature chosen by the Lupercal.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The Lupercal makes a weapon attack.

resist.special: all damage from magical attacks, spells, and effects

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

spellcasting.name: Erratic Magic
headerEntries: The Herald's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
footerEntries: When casting any spell roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 12 or higher the spell succeeds, otherwise it fails. Additionally on a roll of 1 a Wild Magic Surge effect occurs.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Herald fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: The Armour of The Word
entries: This armour grants advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects and imposes disadvantage on spell attack rolls made against The Herald.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Herald regains 13 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Banishing Blow
entries: Once per turn when hitting a creature with Illuminarum the Herald may force them to succeed a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be pushed 30 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When the Herald is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can drop to 1 hit point instead. The Herald can't use this feature again until he finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Unwavering Faith
entries: All allies that're within 30 feet of The Herald are immune to being {@condition charmed} or {@condition {@condition frightened}}, and to any effect that would cause them to move further away from a creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Herald makes four melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Illuminarum
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage. The Herald may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. If hit and affected by the damage, they must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition stunned}} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Arcane Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) radiant damage. If hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 7 ({@damage 3d4}) fire damage.

legendary.name: The Imperial Truth
entries: Iterating rousing litanies of the imperial truth the Herald inspires his sons to greater fervour. All creatures of the Herald's choice within 30 feet who can hear the Herald gain a +7 bonus to their AC and saving throws until start of the Herald's next turn.

resist.special: all damage from magical attacks, spells, and effects

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

footerEntries: When casting any spell roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 1 a Wild Magic Surge effect occurs.

trait.name: Regeneration

trait.name: Banishing Blow

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When the Bearer of The Word is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can drop to 1 hit point instead. The Herald can't use this feature again until he finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Unwavering Faith
entries: All allies that're within 30 feet of The Bearer of The Word are immune to being {@condition charmed} or {@condition {@condition frightened}}, and to any effect that would cause them to move further away from a creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bearer of The Word makes four melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Illuminarum

The Bearer of The Word may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon. If hit and affected by the damage, they must make a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition stunned}} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Arcane Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) radiant damage. If hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 7 ({@damage 3d4}) fire damage.

legendary.name: The Primordial Truth
entries: Iterating rousing litanies of the primordial truth the Bearer of The Word inspires his sons to greater fervour. All of the Bearer of The Word's choice within 30 feet who can hear the Bearer of The Word gain a +7 bonus to their attack and damage rolls until start of the Bearer of The Word's next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Drake fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Blood of Fire
entries: The Drake's powers of endurance and will are phenomenal even amongst his brothers. The Drake has advantage on all saving throws. Additionally all allied creatures within 15 feet of the Drake can add his Charisma modifier (+6) to their Wisdom saving throws and have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition {@condition frightened}}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Drake regains 15 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: The Draken Scale
entries: An relic suit of armour with a large drake skull mounted on one pauldron. The Drake reduces damage taken from fire and radiant damage by half. This occurs before any applicable resistances are applied.

trait.name: Master of the Forge
entries: The Drake is considered proficient in tinker's tools & smith's tools. He is able to spend 10 minutes and 100gp worth of materials to improve a mundane item (such as a weapon or piece of armour) into a +1 variant of that item. Additionally the Drake may repair objects as if casting the mending cantrip using his action.

trait.name: Perpetual
entries: If the Drake is killed he will return to life with 15 hit points after 55 ({@dice 1d100}) days unless his body is completely destroyed. Any wounds or injuries he has sustained are slowly healed between his death and return to life.

trait.name: Relentless Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the Drake to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is from a critical hit. On a success, the Drake drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Drake makes four melee attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dawnbringer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If hit and affected by the damage, the target must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition {@condition stunned}} until the end of their next turn. If the target has 50 hit points or fewer and failed the saving throw it dies instantly.

action.name: Earthshatter
entries: The Drake smashes his hammer into a creature within reach of the Drake. Each creature within 10 ft. of the target (including the target, but not the Drake) must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and their movement speed is halved.

action.name: Gauntlet Heavy Flamethrower
entries: Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

action.name: The Furnace's Heart
entries: This weapon fires a beam of energy in a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage for each creature in the line on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. If any of the damage dice roll maximum damage the Drake may roll one additional damage die.

legendary.name: Rally Allies
entries: The Drake chooses up to 6 creatures within 60ft. of him. If under an effect that forces them to make Wisdom saving throws at the end of their turn, they may make a Wisdom saving throw with advantage to end that effect.

legendary.name: Regeneration
entries: The Drake regains 15 hit points.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Raven fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Fighting Style
entries: The Raven chooses a fighting style from the following at the start of his turn:
The Raven's melee weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.
The Raven makes 2 ({@dice 1d4}) extra melee attacks when he takes the attack or multiattack action.
Melee attacks against the Raven have a -2 penalty to their attack roll.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Raven regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Panoply of The Raven
entries: The Raven is armed with variety of weapons he may switch between, he has: a pair of Arcane Pistols, a pair of Adamantine Talons and a Lightning Whip.

trait.name: Multiattack Defence
entries: When a creature hits the Raven with an attack, the Raven gains a +4 bonus to their AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: The Korvidine Pinions
entries: Integrated into the Raven's armour are a pair of mighty wings made of adamantine metal that grant the Raven a flying speed of 120ft. Additionally when the Raven flies at least 15ft. towards a target and hit it with an attack, that attack deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: The Shadowed Lord
entries: The Raven may Dash and Disengage as bonus actions and whilst in dim light or darkness, the Raven can take the Hide action as a bonus action. When the Raven is hidden in dim light or darkness, he can, as a bonus action, teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see that is also in dim light or darkness. Additionally ranged weapon attacks made against the Raven have disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Raven makes six melee attacks or three ranged attacks with his Arcane Pistols.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Adamantine Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage. The Raven may roll the damage dice twice for this weapon and choose the higher result. This weapon is considered adamantine for the purposes of resistance and immunity.

action.name: Lightning Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage. On a hit the target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution Saving Throw or be {@condition {@condition blinded}} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Arcane Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 15} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) radiant damage. If hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 7 ({@damage 3d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Shroud Bomb {@recharge 5}
entries: The Raven creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered around himself. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Raven adds 8 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them. To do so, the Raven must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Hit & Run
entries: The Raven may take the disengage action and move up to his movement speed.

legendary.name: The Korvidine Pinions
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) slashing damage. Attacks with this weapon are considered adamantine for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Hydra fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Master of Subterfuge
entries: The Hydra has advantage on rolls made to disguise himself as another humanoid creature, and may easily appear as one size smaller when doing so.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Hydra regains 14 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Multiattack Defence
entries: When a creature hits the Hydra with an attack, the Hydra gains a +4 bonus to his AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Mutable Tactics
entries: The Hydra may dash or disengage as a bonus action. The Hydra has a +2 to Initiative rolls and moving through non-magical difficult terrain does not cost extra feet of movement.

trait.name: The Pale Spear
entries: The Pale Spear allows the Hydra to re-roll damage dice of 1 or 2 on attacks made with this weapon. Additionally if the target of an attack from The Pale Spear has 50 hit points or fewer it must succeed a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or it dies instantly. Attacks made with the Pale Spear treat immunity as resistance.

trait.name: The Pythian Scales
entries: This armour grants immunity to acid and poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Hydra makes five melee attacks or three ranged attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: The Pale Spear (Slash)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage. If hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage.

action.name: The Pale Spear (Thrust)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d4 + 7}) piercing damage. If hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or take an additional 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Masterwork Sunfire Blaster
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d4 + 7}) fire damage. The Hydra may re-roll damage die of a 1 or 2 with this weapon.

action.name: Venom Sphere
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) poison damage. On a hit, the target must succeed a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition {@condition poisoned}} for 1 hour.

action.name: Sever One Head {@recharge 5}
entries: The Hydra can use his action to cast Mirror Image as a 2nd level spell. Whilst the spell is active he gains a +2 bonus to his damage rolls for every duplicate he has remaining.

reaction.name: Mutable Tactics
entries: The Hydra may use his reaction to make an attack against a creature that enters his reach.

legendary.name: Dash
entries: The Hydra may take the Dash action.

legendary.name: Hit & Run
entries: The Hydra may take the Disengage action and move up to his movement speed.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The Hydra may make one melee attack against a creature within his reach.

A creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature made of inorganic material such as stone, crystal, or metal has disadvantage on this saving throw. A nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried also takes the damage if it's in the effect's area.

trait.name: Unstoppable Monster
entries: When the knight is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright it is instead reduced to 1 hit point, gains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) temporary hit points and enters a Murderous Rage if it is not already in one. The knight regains the use of this trait after finishing a long rest.

trait.name: Murderous Rage
entries: When the knight reduces a creature to 0 hit points it must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save the knight enters a murderous rage, gaining advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, 2 ({@damage 1d4}) bonus damage to melee attacks, and resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

On the knight's turn it must move towards the nearest hostile creature and take the attack action against it. Should no hostile creatures be in view, the knight chooses the nearest creature instead. Attacks against the knight have advantage. The murderous rage lasts 1 minute or until the knight has not attacked a creature in its last two turns, and when it ends the knight takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Combat Tactics {@recharge 5}
entries: The knight may use it's action to adopt different tactics, choose one of the following options when it uses this action:
- With me, as one! - The knight makes one attack against a target, on a successful hit the next attack from a creature allied with the knight against that target has advantage.
- Focus Fire! - The knight makes one attack against a creature that has already been hit by an ally this round, gaining advantage on the roll.
- Rally to me brothers! - The knight chooses up to 3 friendly creatures, they all gain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) temporary hit points.
- Hold the line! - The knight may use its reaction to make an attack against against a creature that comes into its melee range.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The knight is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save {@dc 17}, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The knight may choose from the following spells:
footerEntries: When casting any spell roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 1 a Wild Magic Surge effect occurs.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The knight has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing or smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The knight regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Betcher's Gland
entries: The knight may use its bonus action to spit acid at a target within 10 feet, make a ranged attack using its Constitution modifier. If the attack hits it deals 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage and the target must make a {@dc 18} constitution save or be {@condition {@condition blinded}} until the end of their next turn. The knight-captain regains the use of this trait when it finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Black Carapace
entries: The knight gains a +2 bonus to its AC (included above).

trait.name: Weaponry
entries: The knight is armed with one melee weapon and one ranged weapon from the list of options in the actions section. They may also be armed with a shield which increases their AC to 22.

trait.name: Force Weapon
entries: The knight may use its bonus action to imbue its melee weapon with magical power, using a spell slot of 1st level or higher and dealing {@damage 2d6} psychic damage per spell slot level on the next attack with that weapon that hits. The magical power in the weapon fades after 1 minute if not used.

trait.name: Heritage of the Crimson King
entries: The knight knows 3 cantrips and only practices non-cantrip spells from one school of magic: Abjuration, Conjuration, Divination, Enchantment, Evocation, Illusion, Necromancy, or Transmutation and gains a bonus depending on their chosen school:
Abjuration: When the knight casts an abjuration spell they gain 18 ({@dice 4d8}) temporary hit points.
Conjuration: Whilst concentrating on a conjuration spell, the knight's concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

Divination: The knight may use their bonus action to divine the future of one enemy creature they can see; the knight gains advantage on the next attack roll against that creature or the creature has disadvantage on the next saving throw the knight forces them to make.

Enchantment: When a creature within 30 feet of the knight makes an attack roll against it, the knight may use its reaction to divert the attack to another target in the attack's range. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom save or target the creature closest to it not including the knight or itself.

Evocation: When the knight casts an evocation spell that affects creatures other than itself it can choose a number of creatures equal to 1 + the spell's level. The chosen creatures automatically succeed their saving throws and take no damage if they would normally take half on a successful save.

Illusion: When a creature makes an attack roll against the knight, it can use its reaction to interpose an illusory duplicate between the attacker and itself. Roll a {@dice d20}, on 11 or higher the attack misses the knight, then the illusion dissipates.
Necromancy: Once per turn when the knight kills a creature that's not a construct or undead with a spell of 1st level or higher it regains hit points equal to 3 times the spell's level.
Transmutation: The knight can cast alter self without expending a spell slot.

reaction.name: Merciless Fighter

trait.name: Betcher's Gland
entries: The knight may use its bonus action to spit acid at a target within 10 feet, make a ranged attack using its Constitution modifier. If the attack hits it deals 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage and the target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution save or be {@condition {@condition blinded}} until the end of their next turn. The knight regains the use of this trait when it finishes a short or long rest.

Additionally once per turn when successfully hitting a creature with a weapon that deals bludgeoning damage the knight can force the creature to succeed a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 ft. away from the knight and knocked {@condition prone}.

items: The knight may dash as a bonus action.

The knight has advantage on initiative rolls.
The knight gains proficiency in a saving throw it doesn't currently have proficiency in.

trait.name: Guardian Spear
entries: Melee attacks made with this weapon are considered adamantine for the purposes of resistance and immunity.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the knight-guardian fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lightning Blows
entries: On a critical hit with a melee attack, the knight-guardian can make a single additional attack against the same creature. This attack cannot generate an additional attack on a critical hit.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The knight-guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The knight-guardian regains 13 hit points at the start of their turn if they have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Multiattack Defence
entries: When a creature hits the knight-guardian with an attack, the knight-guardian gains a +4 bonus to their AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When the knight-guardian is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can drop to 1 hit point instead. The knight can't use this feature again until they finish a long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight-guardian makes three melee attacks with its guardian spear, or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Guardian Spear (Slash)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Guardian Spear (Thrust)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 5d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Guardian Spear (Ranged)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 13} to hit, range 100 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) lightning damage. A bolt of lightning forming a line of 100 feet long (or the lesser distance between the knight and the target) and 5 feet wide blasts out from the guardian spear. On a hit each creature in the line that isn't the target must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes the weapon's damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Whirlwind
entries: The knight-guardian makes a Guardian Spear (Slash) attack at each creature of its choice within 10 feet, making the attack with disadvantage if the creature is more than 5 feet away.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature misses the knight-guardian with a melee attack, the knight-guardian can make a melee weapon attack against the creature.

resist.note: from non magical weapons

trait.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When the knight-sentinel is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can drop to 1 hit point instead. The knight can't use this feature again until they finish a long rest.

trait.name: Bulwark
entries: The knight-sentinel gains a +1 bonus to its AC if it has moved 0 ft. on its turn.

trait.name: Praesidium Shield
entries: Whilst wielding this shield, if the knight-sentinel is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it can use its reaction to take no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, interposing the shield between itself and the source of the effect. Additionally if the knight-sentinel moves no more than half its movement speed on its turn, it counts as being in half cover against ranged attacks whilst wielding this shield.

trait.name: Sentinel Blade
entries: Melee attacks made with this weapon are considered adamantine for the purposes of resistance and immunity.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight-sentinel makes three melee attacks with its sentinel blade, or four ranged attacks.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The knight-sentinel adds 7 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the knight-sentinel must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

baseitem.name: Guardian Spear
entries: A slightly misleading name for the formidable weapon wielded by a {@creature Knight-Guardian of the Lightning Lord|FFESLL}, this polearm resembles a glaive with a strange arcane device capable of projecting blasts of lightning mounted next to the blade.

entries.name: Special
entries: This weapon is considered adamantine for the purposes of resistance and immunity.

entries.name: Ranged Attack
entries: This weapon may also make ranged attacks in the same manner as a ranged weapon, which deal 4d8 lightning damage.

When fired, a bolt of lightning forming a line 100 feet long (or the lesser distance between the firer and the target) and 5 feet wide blasts out from the Guardian Spear. On a hit each creature in the line that isn't the target must make a Dexterity saving throw, with a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifier. A creature takes the weapon's damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
When used as a ranged weapon it has the following additional properties:
